meanings.definition: To reveal the true identity or nature of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The detective unmasked the criminal at the end of the movie.
meanings.sent2: She unmasked her feelings and finally told him she loved him.
meanings.sent3: The magician unmasked the rabbit, revealing it was just a toy all along.
meanings.sent4: The investigation unmasked the corruption within the company.
meanings.sent5: The documentary unmasked the hidden truth behind the famous scandal.

meanings.sent1: The superhero appeared unmasked at the charity event.
meanings.sent2: The unmasked wrestler waved to the cheering crowd.
meanings.sent3: The unmasked ballerina twirled gracefully on stage.
meanings.sent4: The unmasked actor enjoyed the freedom of being recognized in public.
meanings.sent5: The unmasked ninja moved swiftly through the shadows, surprising everyone.
